Talk_01: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>Hey! It's good to see you again.
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thanks again for your help when I was
stuck in those ruins over in Faron.

If you hadn't come by, I'd sure be hungry
by now!
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Anyway, after that I met up with my
friends to wrap up all the Skyview Tower
maintenance requests.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>We stayed in all sorts of places, but we
kept hearing about the incredible food at
Bedrock Bistro.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>The timing was perfect, so I had to come
give it a try.
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>And wow! I definitely recommend it.


<sp:3:0:2:0801>I can't wait to tell Sawson and Billson
how good it is...
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think>But I've been waiting for ages, and the
food hasn't shown up.
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I would have liked to spend some time
off with Sawson and Billson.
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I've heard the owner arguing with other
customers.<sp:5:0:0> I'm getting kind of worried...
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Sawson is a friend from work. We started
climbing Death Mountain together...

<sp:3:0:2:0701>But he wanted to continue on to the
Goron Hot Springs, so we split up.

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>I told him there were plenty of hot springs
around, but he wasn't having it. <sp:5:0:0>No, only
special springs for him!
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Billson is a friend from work. He's a Rito
carpenterâ€”if you're looking for him, keep
an eye out for his headband.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I invited him, but he's a picky eater.
Said he wasn't interested.

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_00>He's a stubborn one. Even if he's
starving, there are some things he
won't eat.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>He flew off south, saying something about
eating fish.
